value.title: How to host a static website with Azure Storage | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how you can host a static website running in Azure Storage in a few steps.     For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips     Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft Azure:

value.title: How to quickly connect to a Linux VM with SSH | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to quickly connect to a Linux Virtual Machine (VM) with secure shell (SSH). If you have Linux VMs that are running inside of Microsoft Azure, you can easily establish an SSH connection.    For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips/
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/7pmn6luCwQ4" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: How to use Jupyter Notebooks in Azure Data Studio | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Vicky Harp joins Scott Hanselman to show how Azure Data Studio combined the simple and robust SQL query editing experience of tools like SSMS with the flexibility and collaboration of Jupyter Notebooks. The November 2019 release of Azure Data Studio included SQL Server 2019 Guide as a Jupyter Book, which
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/pHuRj9ty9cI" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Learn all about Distributed Application Runtime (Dapr), Part 2 | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Aman Bhardwaj and Yaron Schneider join Scott Hanselman to talk about the actor model of Distributed Application Runtime (Dapr). Dapr is a portable, event-driven runtime that makes it easy for developers to build resilient, microservice stateless and stateful applications that run on the cloud and edge
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Wbv963s8By8" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Operational best practices for web apps on Azure App Service | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Azure App Service hosts millions of apps, serves trillions of requests per day, and has an SLA of 99.95%. But what should you do when your app has issues in production? Byron Tardif joins Scott Hanselman to discuss some operational best practices for running your web apps on Azure App Service.  0:00
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/JAqoLC2dv-M" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Evaluate text with Azure Cognitive Language Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Cognitive Language Services to analyze text, determine intent, detect adult themes, and process natural language input

topItems.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

topItems.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

topItems.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the Text Analytics API and Azure Functions to discover what your customers are really saying in their feedback about your products or brands.

value.title: Add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn how to add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory.

value.title: Analyze receipts with the Form Recognizer service
value.excerpt: Processing invoices and receipts is a common task in many business scenarios. Increasingly, organizations are turning to artificial intelligence (AI) to automate data extraction from scanned receipts.

value.title: Enable automatic updates in a web application using Azure Functions and SignalR Service
value.excerpt: Update a web app's notification mechanism from polling to push-based architecture with SignalR Service, Azure Cosmos DB and Azure Functions. Use Vue.js and JavaScript to use SignalR using Visual Studio Code.

value.title: Build a web app with Blazor WebAssembly and Visual Studio Code
value.excerpt: Learn how to set up your development environment and build your first WebAssembly app with Blazor, Visual Studio Code, and C#.

value.title: Chain Azure Functions together using input and output bindings
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll learn how to integrate your Azure Function with various data sources by using bindings.

value.title: Choose the appropriate API for Azure Cosmos DB
value.excerpt: Compare the different APIs that are available in Azure Cosmos DB, highlighting and contrasting the different scenarios that would make them a good choice for a company.

value.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the Text Analytics API and Azure Functions to discover what your customers are really saying in their feedback about your products or brands.

value.title: Configure security policies to manage data
value.excerpt: Learn how to set up policies to classify, retain, and protect your cloud-based data.

value.title: Create a build pipeline with Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Set up a continuous integration (CI) pipeline that automates the process of building your application.

value.title: Create, configure, and manage identities
value.excerpt: Create, configure, and manage identities

value.title: Create custom roles for Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)
value.excerpt: Learn how to create custom roles for Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC).

value.title: Create a language model with Language Understanding
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model.

value.title: Create a multistage pipeline by using Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Design and create a realistic release pipeline that promotes changes to various testing and staging environments.

value.title: Create your first Azure IoT Central app
value.excerpt: This module builds an IoT Central app to monitor and command a refrigerated truck. The first unit creates the app, the second unit defines a device template for a refrigerated truck. Then, create a programming project, add code to simulate a truck, and communicate with your IoT Central app. The truck is monitored through a custom dashboard.

value.title: Automate multi-container Kubernetes deployments with Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Implement a CI/CD pipeline for multiple containers to Kubernetes.

value.title: Describe security concepts and methodologies
value.excerpt: Describe security concepts and methodologies

value.title: Describe SQL Server query plans
value.excerpt: Read and understand various forms of execution plans. Compare estimated vs actual plans. Learn how and why plans are generated.

value.title: Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Learn how to create a data warehouse in Azure Synapse Analytics in minutes to take advantage of massively parallel processing (MPP) and run complex queries at petabyte scale quickly

value.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure
value.excerpt: Use monitoring services on Azure to bring operational excellence to your applications and infrastructure.

value.title: Detect and analyze faces with the Face service
value.excerpt: Face detection, analysis, and recognition is an important capability for artificial intelligence (AI) solutions. The Face cognitive service in Azure makes it easy integrate these capabilities into your applications.

value.title: Develop, test, and publish Azure Functions by using Azure Functions Core Tools
value.excerpt: Find out how to develop an Azure Function in Visual Studio with a test framework to create, deploy, and test this scalable and secure service.

value.title: Enterprise-scale architecture networking design principles
value.excerpt: Enterprise-scale architecture networking design principles

value.title: Explore and analyze time-stamped data with Time Series Insights
value.excerpt: Azure Time Series Insights allows you to collect, process, store, analyze, and query data at Internet Of Things (IoT) scale. Learn how to deploy this service and use it to gain insights from data generated by IoT devices.

value.title: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure
